name: 蘇春𤂌
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。食材簡介。
schedule:

Week 1: Metal processing and manufacturing (1)
Week 2: Solidification and casting processes (2)
Week 3: Solidification and casting processes (2)
Week 4: Stress and strain during deformation (3)
Week 5: Bulk deformation processes (4)
Week 6: Bulk deformation processes (4)
Week 7: Sheet forming processes (5)
Week 8: Powder metallurgy (6)
Week 9:　　Midterm Exam 
Week 10: Machining processes (7)
Week 11: Machining processes (7)
Week 12: Joining processes (8)
Week 13: Surface modification for wear resistance (9)
Week 14: Introduction to Materials Processing (M1)
Week 15: Solid Processes (M4)
Week 16: Solid Processes (M4)
Week 17: Vapor Processes (M7)
Week 18:　　Final Exam
